div.h2: Download code samples and applications for Windows 8, Windows Phone, Windows Azure, Office, SharePoint, Silverlight and other products. You can also explore the Official Visual Studio C#, VB.NET, and 101 LINQ samples.New samples are added frequently in JavaScript, C++, C#, Visual Basic, and F#.

div.div: Each sample is licensed to you by the party distributing it. Microsoft does not guarantee the samples or grant rights for any sample distributed by a party other than Microsoft. Use of this site is subject to the Terms of Use.

div.select: Popularity Release date Updated date Downloads Ratings Title Author

td.div: The AdventureWorks Data Binding sample demonstrates data binding that uses the Entity Framework. This application displays and modifies SalesOrderDetail entities associated with SalesOrderHeader entities.

div.div: This sample was verified and tested by Windows SDK team.

div.p: Windows SDK samples are developed and tested by the Windows team to ensure that you have a great experience.

td.div: This sample pack includes all the app code examples developed and updated for Windows 8.1. The sample pack provides a convenient way to download all the samples at once. The samples in this sample pack are available in C#, Visual Basic, C++, and JavaScript.

div.div: This sample was verified and tested by Microsoft - Visual Studio Platform Team.

div.p: Microsoft - Visual Studio Platform Team MSFT
Visual Studio Platform Team samples are developed and tested by the Visual Studio Platform Team to ensure that you have a great experience.

td.div: Learn how to use LINQ in your applications with these code samples, covering the entire range of LINQ functionality and demonstrating LINQ with SQL, DataSets, and XML.

div.a: Official Visual Studio 2010 Samples for C# 4.0

div.div: This sample was verified and tested by Microsoft - Visual Studio Platform Team.

div.p: Microsoft - Visual Studio Platform Team MSFT
Visual Studio Platform Team samples are developed and tested by the Visual Studio Platform Team to ensure that you have a great experience.

td.div: These are the official samples for Visual Studio 2010 C# 4.0.

div.a: Getting Started with ASP.NET 4.5 Web Forms and Visual Studio 2013 - Wingtip Toys

td.div: This download has been created for the ASP.NET 4.5 Web Forms and Visual Studio 2013 (Wingtip Toys) tutorial series. This series of tutorials guides you through the steps required to create an ASP.NET Web Forms application using Visual Studio Express 2013 for Web and ASP.NET 4.5.

div.label: Technologies
div.div: ASP.NET Web Forms, ASP.NET 4.5, Visual Studio Express 2013 for Web

td.div: What I build is just a simple calculator that will show beginners how much easy it is to develop applications using the .NET Framework. Through this sample, they will see some most useful algorithmic operations.
HVRemote reduces the manual configuration steps needed for Hyper-V Remote Management down to a few simple commands, and can diagnose common configuration errors.

div.div: This sample was verified and tested by Windows SDK team.

div.p: Windows SDK samples are developed and tested by the Windows team to ensure that you have a great experience.

td.div: This sample pack includes all the app code examples developed and updated for Windows 8. The sample pack provides a convenient way to download all the samples at once. The samples in this sample pack are available in C#, C++, VB.NET, and JavaScript.

div.div: This sample was verified and tested by Windows Phone SDK Team.

div.p: Windows Phone SDK samples are developed and tested by the Windows Phone SDK Team to ensure that you have a great experience.

td.div: This sample shows you how to use LINQ to SQL to store relational data in a local database that resides in your app’s storage container.

div.a: ASP.NET MVC Application Using Entity Framework Code First

td.div: A Visual Studio project which shows how to use the Entity Framework 5 in an ASP.NET MVC 4 web application project, using the Code First development approach.

div.label: Technologies
div.div: ADO.NET Entity Framework, ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC
This sample was verified and tested by Windows SDK team.

div.p: Windows SDK samples are developed and tested by the Windows team to ensure that you have a great experience.

td.div: This sample shows how to create, read, write, copy and delete a file, how to retrieve file properties, and how to track a file or folder so that your app can access it again. This sample uses Windows.Storage and Windows.Storage.AccessCache API.

div.h4: Couldn't find the sample you were looking for?

div.a: Click here to search and vote for a sample request.
